title: Human Factors Engineer
summary: Apple is looking for an expert human factors engineer who could initiate, plan, and lead investigational studies for the Spatial Computing space.
description: We identify human factors risk and propose vital human factors research at all phases of product/technology development.
key_qualifications: Proficiency in the diverse toolkit of experience assessment for virtual human, avatar, and telepresence and ability to select, scale, and adapt your research plan to achieve a goal effectively
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 3 years relevant industry experience
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
